conversation.text: For a sword and sorcery mood, I recommend 'Conan the Destroyer' (1984). With its classic fantasy plot and iconic cast including Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sarah Douglas, and Mako, this movie is sure to transport you into a sorcerous world.

It features a team of characters trying to destroy an ancient lizard-like god causing chaos in Chicago. Starring Clayton Rohner, James Whitmore, and others, this film offers elements of the fantasy genre.
